title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-5.2 - Wiping cloths
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-5.2 - Wiping cloths

State Regulations
(a) Cloths or sponges used for wiping food spills on food-contact surfaces of
equipment shall be cleaned and rinsed frequently in one of the sanitizing
solutions permitted in section
271-5.3
(h) of this

Subpart and used for no other purpose. These cloths and sponges shall be stored
in the sanitizing solution between uses. (b) Cloths or sponges used for cleaning
nonfood-contact surfaces of equipment shall be clean and rinsed as specified in
subdivision (a) of this section and used for no other purpose. These cloths and
sponges shall be stored in the sanitizing solution between uses. (c) Single-service disposable towels are
permitted in lieu of wiping cloths or sponges if they are discarded after each
use. Notes
